title: Patrik Flodin
text: Patrik Flodin (born 16 August 1984) is a <a href="Rallying">rally</a> driver from <a href="Sweden">Sweden</a>. Flodin won the Swedish Championship in 2006. In <a href="2009%20World%20Rally%20Championship%20season">2009</a>, Flodin contests in the <a href="Production%20World%20Rally%20Championship">Production World Rally Championship</a> (PWRC) with the "Uspenskiy Rally Tecnica" (URT) team, driving a Subaru Impreza. He also became the 2009 Russian Rally Champion. In Sardinia 2011, he will be driving a Mini Countryman WRC.
